Translations.Text: Maly my poslaly na nykh zamistʹ tsʹoho zhovti sandstorm, vony by prodovzhyly disbelieve
Vy ne mozhete zrobyty mertvyy, ne hlukhyy, chuyete vyklyk, odnoho razu vony prohanyayutʹ
Ne mozhete vy keruyete zaviskoyu z yikhnʹoho zbyvayuchoyi z shlyakhu. Vy mozhete tilʹky buty pochuti tsymy khto viryatʹ v nashym vidkryttyam, ta vyrishyte staty submitters

BOH yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto utvoryv vas slabi, todi harantuvaly vam pislya syly slabkosti, todi zaminenoyi pislya slabkosti syly ta siroho volossya. Vin stvoryuye shchob ni Vin wills. Vin yavlyaye soboyu Omniscient, Omnipotent
Na dni koly Hodyna prybuvaye proyty, vynuvatyy prysyahnetʹsya shcho vony tryvaly (u tsʹomu sviti) tilʹky odna hodyna. Tse - yak nepravylʹni vony

Tsey khto blahoslovlyayetesʹ z znannyam ta viroyu skazhe, "Vy vytrymaly, z·hidno z BOZHYM dekretom, do Dnya Resurrection. Zaraz, tse yavlyaye soboyu Denʹ Resurrection, ale vy ne spromohlysya shchob vyznaty tse
Tomu, niyake vybachennya, na shcho denʹ, ne bude vyhoda porushnyky, ne budutʹ vony budutʹ vybacheni
Otzhe, my protsytuvaly dlya lyudey u tse Quran vsi riznovydy prykladiv. Dosi, niyaka materiya yakyy riznovyd dokazu vy ne predstavlyayete do disbelievers, yak kazhutʹ, "Vy falsifiers
BOH takym chynom opechatuye serdenʹka tsykh khto ne znayutʹ
Tomu, vy budete steadfastly persevere - dlya BOZHOYI obitsyanky yavlyaye soboyu pravdu - ta ne intimidated tsymy khto ne dosyahnuv certainty
